properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE WHERE ST_CATEGORY = 1
SELECT RNUM, ST_NO, ST_CONTENT, ST_TITLE, ST_PRICE, ST_QUAN, ST_PATH, ST_ONAME, ST_RNAME, ST_CATEGORY, ST_SELQUAN FROM GLIST WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE WHERE ST_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND ST_CATEGORY = 1

SELECT RNUM, ST_NO, ST_CONTENT, ST_TITLE, ST_PRICE, ST_QUAN, ST_PATH, ST_ONAME, ST_RNAME, ST_CATEGORY, ST_SELQUAN FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ST_NO, ST_CONTENT, ST_TITLE, ST_PRICE, ST_QUAN, ST_PATH, ST_ONAME, ST_RNAME, ST_CATEGORY, ST_SELQUAN FROM STORE WHERE ST_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND ST_CATEGORY = 1 ORDER BY ST_NO DESC ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE WHERE ST_CATEGORY = 2
SELECT RNUM, ST_NO, ST_CONTENT, ST_TITLE, ST_PRICE, ST_QUAN, ST_PATH, ST_ONAME, ST_RNAME, ST_CATEGORY, ST_SELQUAN FROM TLIST WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE WHERE ST_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND ST_CATEGORY = 2

SELECT RNUM, ST_NO, ST_CONTENT, ST_TITLE, ST_PRICE, ST_QUAN, ST_PATH, ST_ONAME, ST_RNAME, ST_CATEGORY, ST_SELQUAN FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ST_NO, ST_CONTENT, ST_TITLE, ST_PRICE, ST_QUAN, ST_PATH, ST_ONAME, ST_RNAME, ST_CATEGORY, ST_SELQUAN FROM STORE WHERE ST_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND ST_CATEGORY = 2 ORDER BY ST_NO DESC ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT ST_NO, ST_CONTENT, ST_TITLE, ST_PRICE, ST_QUAN, ST_PATH, ST_ONAME, ST_RNAME, ST_CATEGORY, ST_SELQUAN FROM STORE WHERE ST_NO = ? AND ST_CATEGORY = 1 ORDER BY ST_NO
SELECT ST_NO, ST_CONTENT, ST_TITLE, ST_PRICE, ST_QUAN, ST_PATH, ST_ONAME, ST_RNAME, ST_CATEGORY, ST_SELQUAN FROM STORE WHERE ST_NO = ? AND ST_CATEGORY = 1 ORDER BY ST_NO
SELECT * FROM MEMBER M, PAYMENT P, ORDER_LIST O, STORE S WHERE m.mem_no = p.mem_no AND p.pay_code = o.pay_code AND o.st_no = s.st_no AND M.MEM_ID = ?
SELECT ST_NO, ST_CONTENT, ST_TITLE, ST_PRICE, ST_QUAN, ST_PATH, ST_ONAME, ST_RNAME, ST_CATEGORY, ST_SELQUAN FROM STORE WHERE ST_NO = ? AND ST_CATEGORY = 2 ORDER BY ST_NO
